languages.text: {n}Идира зачерпывает пригоршню осколков и сжимает пальцы — так, что из ее сомкнутого кулака сочатся капли крови.{/n} "Я вижу... переливы, сияние, синие огни... лица... ближе... Леди Теодора... еще... Кунрад... еще... что это? Ай!" {n}Псайкер испугано встряхивает рукой.{/n} "Что-то темное... огромное... ох, недобрая это была вещь, {name}!"

{n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Lady Theodora... and... Kunrad... and... what is that? Ah!" {n}She shakes her hand, looking frightened.{/n} "Something dark... enormous... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

Леди Теодора... еще... Кунрад... еще... что это? Ай!" {n}Псайкер испугано встряхивает рукой.{/n} "Что-то темное... огромное... ох, недобрая это была вещь, {name}!"

Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉拿起一把碎片，把它死死地攥在手里，甚至连鲜血都从她手里渗了出来，滴落在地上。{/n}“我看到了……各种各样的色彩、光芒，还有蓝色的光……许多张脸……越来越近……那是西奥多拉夫人……还有……昆拉德……还有……那到底是什么东西？啊！”{n}她摇着手，看起来被吓坏了。{/n}“那是某种黑暗的……巨大的东西……噢，{name}！这些玻璃渣实在是令人厌恶，这一点毫无疑问！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Lady Theodora... and... Kunrad... and... what is that? Ah!" {n}She shakes her hand, looking frightened.{/n} "Something dark... enormous... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉拿起一把碎片，把它死死地攥在手里，甚至连鲜血都从她手里渗了出来，滴落在地上。{/n}“我看到了……各种各样的色彩、光芒，还有蓝色的光……许多张脸……越来越近……那是西奥多拉夫人……还有……昆拉德……还有……那到底是什么东西？啊！”{n}她摇着手，看起来被吓坏了。{/n}“那是某种黑暗的……巨大的东西……噢，{name}！这些玻璃渣实在是令人厌恶，这一点毫无疑问！”

languages.text: {n}Idira recoge un puñado de esquirlas y aprieta tanto el puño que empieza a gotear sangre.{/n} «Veo... rastros de color, luminiscencia, luces azules... caras... se acercan... Lady Theodora... y... Kunrad... y... ¿qué es eso? ¡Ah!». {n}Agita la mano, asustada.{/n} «Algo siniestro... y enorme... {name}, ¡no cabe duda de que este cristal era algo inmundo, puedo asegurárselo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Lady Theodora... and... Kunrad... and... what is that? Ah!" {n}She shakes her hand, looking frightened.{/n} "Something dark... enormous... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira recoge un puñado de esquirlas y aprieta tanto el puño que empieza a gotear sangre.{/n} «Veo... rastros de color, luminiscencia, luces azules... caras... se acercan... Lady Theodora... y... Kunrad... y... ¿qué es eso? ¡Ah!». {n}Agita la mano, asustada.{/n} «Algo siniestro... y enorme... {name}, ¡no cabe duda de que este cristal era algo espantoso, puedo asegurárselo!».

languages.text: {n}イディラは一握りの破片をすくい上げ、拳から血が床に滴り落ち始めるほどの力で握り締めた。{/n}「見える…色の筋、発光、青い光…顔が…近づいてくる…シオドーラ様…そして…クンラッド…そして…何だ？ああ！」 {n}彼女は怯えた様子で手を振った。{/n}「何か黒い…巨大な…ああ、{name}このガラスの物体は何か悪いものでした、それは確かです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Lady Theodora... and... Kunrad... and... what is that? Ah!" {n}She shakes her hand, looking frightened.{/n} "Something dark... enormous... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは一握りの破片をすくい上げ、拳から血が床に滴り落ち始めるほどの力で握り締めた。{/n}「見える…色の筋、発光、青い光…顔が…近づいてくる…レディ・テオドラ…そして…クンラッド…そして…何だ？ああ！」 {n}彼女は怯えた様子で手を振った。{/n}「何か黒い…巨大な…ああ、{name}このガラスの物体は何か悪いものでした、それは確かです！」
{n}イディラは一握りの破片をすくい上げ、拳から血が床に滴り落ち始めるほどの力で握り締めた。{/n}「見える…色の筋、発光、青い光…顔が…近づいてくる…シオドーラ様…そして…クンラッド…そして…何だ？ああ！」 {n}彼女は怯えた様子で手を振った。{/n}「何か黒い…巨大な…ああ、{name}このガラスの物体は何か悪いものでした、それは確かです！」

languages.text: {n}Idira ramasse une poignée d'éclats et les serre si fort dans sa main qu'un filet de sang commence à goutter au sol.{/n} « Je vois... des traînées de couleur, une lueur, des lumières bleues... des visages... qui se rapprochent... Dame Théodora... et... Kunrad... et... Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Ah ! » {n}Elle secoue la main, visiblement effrayée.{/n} « Quelque chose d'énorme... de monstrueux... Cette chose en verre était vraiment dangereuse, {name}, vous pouvez me croire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Lady Theodora... and... Kunrad... and... what is that? Ah!" {n}She shakes her hand, looking frightened.{/n} "Something dark... enormous... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira ramasse une poignée d'éclats et les serre si fort dans sa main qu'un filet de sang commence à couler sur le sol.{/n} « Je vois... des traînées de couleur, de la luminescence, des lumières bleues... des visages... qui se rapprochent... Dame Théodora... et... Kunrad... et... Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Ah ! » {n}Elle secoue la main, visiblement effrayée.{/n} « Quelque chose d'énorme... de monstrueux... Cette chose en verre était vraiment dangereuse, {name}, vous pouvez me croire ! »

languages.text: {n}Idira hebt eine Handvoll Splitter auf und presst sie in ihrer Faust so stark zusammen, dass Blut zu Boden tropft.{/n} "Ich sehe ... Farbstreifen, schillerndes Leuchten, blaue Lichter ... Gesichter ... sie nähern sich ... Lady Theodora ... und ... Kunrad ... und ... was ist das? Ah!" {n}Sie macht eine abwehrende Gerste und sieht verängstigt aus.{/n} "Etwas Dunkles ... Riesiges ... Oh, {name}, dieses Glasding war etwas Übles, so viel steht fest!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoops up a handful of shards and clenches them in her fist with such strength that blood starts dripping on the floor.{/n} "I see... streaks of colour, luminescence, blue lights... faces... drawing closer... Oh, {name}, this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

Oh, , this glass thing was something foul, that's for sure!"

languages.text: {n}İdira bir avuç dolusu parçayı aldığı gibi avucunda sıkıyor. Fazla sıkmış olacak ki zemine kan damlamaya başlıyor.{/n}"Görüyorum... Renk çizgileri, parıltılar, mavi ışıklar... Yüzler... Gitgide yaklaşıyorlar... Leydi Theodora ve... Kunrad... O da ne? Ah!" {n}Dehşete kapılmış hâlde, elini silkeliyor.{/n} "Karanlık bir şey... Muazzam... {name}, bu camdan şeyin habis bir nesne olduğundan adım gibi eminim!"
